body.p: can convert double and single quotes to the quotation characters of your choice as you type. To turn on smart quotes and select the quotation marks to use, and go to Editor Edit Modes Author AutoCorrect .

The following options are available:
Replace "double quotes" with "smart quotes" - The selected open and close quote characters as inserted when you type double quotes.
Replace "single quotes" with "smart quotes" - The selected open and close quote characters as inserted when you type single quotes.
To change the quotation marks that are inserted, click the Start quote and End quote buttons.
